name: Legio Mortis
description:
Choose a class, and enter the fight against the legion of the dead.

Slay the skeletons, then pick up the crystals they drop for various effects.

The more skeletons you slay, the more will come for you.

Fight until you cannot fight anymore.

This is a prototype project to be used as a testing ground for various features.

Feel free to enjoy the current implementation.

I appreciate any feedback you may wish to share.
